param.name: eventId
param.span: 该方法将处理的事件的标识符。

span.span: The identifier for the event the method will handle.

param.name: element
param.span: 要与事件处理程序关联的 UI 自动化元素。

span.span: The UI Automation element to associate with the event handler.

param.name: scope
param.span: 要处理的事件的范围；即，它们是在元素本身上，还是在其上级和子代上。

span.span: The scope of events to be handled; that is, whether they are on the element itself, or on its ancestors and descendants.

param.name: eventHandler
param.span: 发生指定事件时调用的方法。

span.span: The method to call when the specified event occurs.

summary.span: 注册用于处理 UI 自动化事件的方法。

span.span: Registers a method that handles UI Automation events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 某些类（如 ）公开标识特定于类的事件的字段。Some classes, such as , expose fields identifying events that are specific to the class. 方法提供了一种机制，用于为这些事件注册处理程序。The method provides a mechanism that enables you to register handlers for these events. `eventHandler` 可以是方法的实例，也可以是对 Visual Basic) 中 (方法的引用 `AddressOf` 。`eventHandler` can be an instance of the method, or a reference to the method (`AddressOf` in Visual Basic).

summary.span: 比较指定参数以确定它们是否引用相同的用户界面 (UI) 元素。

span.span: Compares the specified parameters to determine whether they refer to the same user interface (UI) element.

summary.span: 比较两个包含运行时标识符 (Id) 以确定其内容是否相同的整数数组。

span.span: Compares two integer arrays containing run-time identifiers (IDs) to determine whether their content is the same.

returns.span: 如果比较的运行时 Id 引用 (UI) 元素的相同用户界面，则为;否则为 。

span.span: if the compared run-time IDs refer to the same user interface (UI) element; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果任何一个参数为空引用 (`Nothing` Visual Basic) 中，将 引发 异常。If either of the arguments is a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), throws an exception. ## Examples 下面的示例函数确定运行时 ID 是否在运行时 id 列表中。The following example function determines whether a run-time ID is in a list of run-time IDs. param.name: el1

summary.span: 比较两个 UI 自动化元素， 如果两者都引用同一 UI 元素，则返回。

span.span: Compares two UI Automation elements, returning if both refer to the same UI element.

returns.span: 如果 UI 元素的运行时标识符相同，则为; 否则为。否则为 。

span.span: if the run time identifiers of the UI elements are the same; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果任何一个参数为空引用 (`Nothing` Visual Basic) 中，将 引发 异常。If either of the arguments is a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), throws an exception. 此方法等效于对象的相等运算符 。This method is equivalent to the equality operator for objects.
